CustomField.description: Identifies if the viewing User matches the Account Owner Country, allowing the UK and Ireland to make edits in the UK&I.
CustomField.formula: OR( AND( TEXT(Owner_Region__c) = "UK&I", TEXT($User.Region__c) = "UK&I" ), Owner_Country__c = $User.Country, $Permission.Delegated_Admin = TRUE, $Permission.System_Administrator = TRUE )
CustomField.label: System: User Edit Access
